description:
Phoenix is unable to slowdown Shiba and Agora`a attack. They paralyse Phoenix with their unusual powers, rendering Phoenix`s bronze strength useless against them. But once the scared little girl runs to phoenix for protection, and Phoenix receives some much needed spiritual strength from Saori (Athena) he has the power to do what he knows he must. After a lengthy battle, Phoenix manages to defeat Shaka`s disciples and saves the little girl from hahn. Back at the sanctuary, the remaining bronze saints reach the house of Virgo and prepare to enter; ever conscious of Aioria`s warning about not letting Shaka open his eyes. As they enter, we .. .
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuujou no Kizuna! Athena no Sakebi
¡Lazos de amistad! El grito de Atenea
友情のきずな! アテナの叫び
